sections.title: Horizon Walker (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Horizon Walker class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiencies (Horizon Walker)
sections.description: Horizon walkers gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor beyond their base class or racial proficiencies.

sections.title: Favored Terrain (Horizon Walker)
sections.description: Functions like the ranger's favored terrain ability, granting bonuses in selected terrain types and allowing other terrain-based class features to work in these terrains.

sections.title: Terrain Mastery (Horizon Walker)
sections.description: Allows the horizon walker to grant skill bonuses to nearby allies as a move action and provides permanent passive benefits based on the mastered terrain type.

sections.title: Terrain Dominance (Horizon Walker)
sections.description: Treats favored terrain bonus as favored enemy bonus against creatures native to the dominated terrain and grants powerful spell-like abilities or supernatural benefits.

sections.title: Master of All Lands (Su) (Horizon Walker)
sections.description: All terrain bonuses increase by +2, treats non-favored terrains as favored, automatically succeeds on weather/temperature saves, and grants bonuses to nearby allies on such saves.
